title: Catalan Numbers, Riccati Equations and Convergence
authors: Yicheng Feng and Jean-Pierre Fouque and Tomoyuki Ichiba
abstract:
We analyze both finite and infinite systems of Riccati equations derived from
stochastic differential games on infinite networks. We discuss a connection to
the Catalan numbers and the convergence of the Catalan functions by Fourier
transforms.
